title: Open Channel Management - RegulationStructure
description: This entity contains a harmonised description of a generic regulation structure made for Open Channel Management (raw-water systems). Regulation structure consists a junction type object, controlling the water flow in a channel

numberOfGates.description: Property. An integer value defining the number of gates attached to the regulation structure

numberOfSpillways.description: Property. An integer value defining the number of spillways attached to the regulation structure

telecommand.description: Property. Define whether the regulation structure is controlled remotely or manually. True/False value

hasSluiceGate.description: Relationship. A relationship to the ID label of the Sluice gate

hasSpillway.description: Relationship. A relationship to the ID label of the spillway

allOf.description: Property. The distance between this CrossSection and a reference point (e.g., the most upstream point of the system)
Relationship. The reference point distance is count from
